review: I love this item.  We do not have any cable or channels on our television.  But, with the fire stick, we can easily watch Netflix or Amazon Prime videos directly through the television.  I no longer have to have the cord connecting my tv to my kindle.  It is easy to use.  And I like that I have parental blocks on it as needed.  My 7 year old can operate it without issue.  We haven't lost the remote, but if I do, I have the fire stick remote app on my phone.  I have tried that and it works just fine.We had a few issues at the start where it was not staying connected to the internet.  but, I think that was due to my wi-fi and where I had it placed at the time.  We haven't had any issues since.

review: I love the Fire TV Stick! The picture quality is great, the set up was easy and the menus make it easy to use. For the time being I use it at home through my home wireless, but I travel quite a bit during the summer and plan to use the Stick at RV Parks with good Wi-Fi or cell phone hot spot. Digital TV on antenna is not dependable and Fire TV could be the answer. If it works as well on the road as it works at home, I may never get a satellite system for my RV!
